question: What does MetaHIT stand for?
ideal_answer: Metagenomics of the Human Intestinal Tract (MetaHIT) project are focusing mainly on the human microbiome

snippets.text: The importance of microbiome constituency is so relevant that several consortia like the Human Microbiome project (HMP) and Metagenomics of the Human Intestinal Tract (MetaHIT) project are focusing mainly on the human microbiome.

exact_answer: Metagenomics of the Human Intestinal Tract
